definitions.text: a state of being relaxed and feeling no pain
examples: he is a man who enjoys his comfort
she longed for the comfortableness of her armchair

definitions.text: a feeling of freedom from worry or disappointment
the act of consoling; giving relief in affliction
examples: his presence was a consolation to her

definitions.text: a freedom from financial difficulty that promotes a comfortable state
examples: a life of luxury and ease
he had all the material comforts of this world

definitions.text: satisfaction or physical well-being provided by a person or thing
examples: a padded chair was one of the room's few comforts

definitions.text: bedding made of two layers of cloth filled with stuffing and stitched together
assistance, such as that provided to an enemy or to a known criminal
examples: it gave comfort to the enemy

definitions.text: give moral or emotional strength to

examples: ease the pain in your legs
